modName: Sapphire Archery Necklace and Ring for Hunters
summary: This is a Necklace and Ring for a Hunter. It boosts several things.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Description updated: May 8, 2017

Please use [url=http://forum.valixx-online.de]my forum[/url] for support. Thank you.[/center]

[center][url=http://twitter.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/twitter-small.png[/img][/url][url=http://facebook.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/facebookLogo-small.png[/img][/url][/center]



This is a Necklace and Ring for a Hunter. It boosts several things.

I like playing as a Hunter therefore i made those 2 items for me. I'm not always playing Skyrim to make Quests... i'm just sitting in my little hunter camp, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32927/]Monaghan Camp[/url] ( mod by me ), and hunt the elks and bears.

To add the items simply open the console and type:

help archery 4 or help "sapphire archery" 4 ( yes, with the double quotes )

The last 2 items, named Sapphire Archery Ring and Sapphire Archery Necklace, are the items from this mod. Add it with this command:

player.additem 62xxxxx 1 ( Take the ids from the items ).
